Class DeckViewPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent

javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.TilePane
net.sf.cotelab.playingcards.demo.DeckViewPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class DeckViewPane extends javafx.scene.layout.TilePane
A node that presents the full set of card images.
Author:
cote
